overview: In the heart of Marseille, a collective decided to shelter isolated minors and families seeking asylum: the Saint-Just squat was born. In the former convent that shelters it, a real solidarity district is set up: for 18 months, more than 1000 inhabitants come and go, mutual aid movements are created, minors are schooled, cultural actions are born, access to care is structured... and so much more.
title: 18 Months
